items.title: iQOO 15R's Dark Knight model teased ahead of launch
items.summary: iQOO is set to launch the iQOO 15R in India on February 24. The brand previously showed us the 15R with a checkered design, and now we are looking at the smartphone's Dark Knight version, which is black and has a stealthy look. However, it's unclear if these will be the only colors the iQOO 15R wilâ€¦

items.title: Samsung unveils enhanced Care+ protection plan in Europe
items.summary: Today Samsung has announced an enhanced Samsung Care+ protection plan for 17 European markets. This includes unlimited accidental damage cover, for knocks, drops, and spills, with a "streamlined" excess fee. There's also seamless care at home as well as abroad - the previous 60-day trip limit has bâ€¦

items.summary: Bendita Film Sales has boarded â€œA Fading Manâ€ ahead of its world premiere in Rotterdam Film Festivalâ€™s Tiger Competition. items.title: Wallace Huo, Ethan Ruan, Gigi Leung Lead Netflixâ€™s Expanded Chinese-Language Slate
items.summary: Netflix has unveiled an expanded slate of Chinese-language originals for 2026, announcing seven new series that bring together top-tier talent from across Greater China, including Wallace Huo, Ethan Ruan and Gigi Leung. The newly announced projects span multiple genres from psychological thrillers â€¦

items.title: Swansea council motion calls for WRU Ospreys U-turn
items.summary: A Swansea council motion will urge the WRU to withdraw its proposal to reduce the number of professional regional rugby teams in Wales from four to three.

items.title: Redmi Turbo 5 stars in a hands-on video ahead of its official announcement
items.summary: Mere hours ago, Redmi confirmed some of the upcoming Turbo 5's specs, and now the phone has surfaced in a hands-on video over in China, where it's showcased from all angles. Its design is similar to that of its predecessor, but the back allegedly has a better texture and the whole thing just looks â€¦

items.title: After Hall of Fame snub, what next for 'Super Bowl god' Belichick?
items.summary: He is one of the most decorated coaches in NFL history, but his snub from the Pro Football Hall of Fame adds to a growing list of defeats.

items.title: A 'miracle' moment - how Mourinho's Benfica stunned Real Madrid
items.summary: Goalkeeper Anatoly Trubin's header gives Jose Mourinho an unforgettable moment as Benfica beat Real Madrid to stay alive in the Champions League.

items.title: Rosenior comes out on top as Conte's European woes continue
items.summary: Antonio Conte lifted the Champions League as a player in 1995-96 but has experienced nothing but despair as a manager in the competition.

items.title: Newcastle prove they can mix it with European champions
items.summary: Newcastle United have experienced all manner of emotions at the Parc des Princes, but the visitors left with immense pride following a 1-1 draw against Paris St-Germain

items.title: Halide co-founder Sebastiaan de With is joining Apple’s design team
items.summary: Sebastiaan de With, known for his work on apps like Halide, Kino, and Orion as the co-founder of Lux, is joining Apple's design team, he announced today. "So excited to work with the very best team in the world on my favorite products," de With says in his post. Some big personal news: I've joined â€¦

items.title: How 'clinical' Tottenham beat Frankfurt
items.summary: Champions League pundits Stephen Warnock, Nedum Onuoha and Julien Lauren discuss Tottenham's "clinical ability" to score goals away from home and Thomas Frank's "great achievement" to handle the pressure.

items.title: 'It's absolutely brilliant!' - Trubin's goal sends Benfica into play-offs
items.summary: Champions League pundits Stephen Warnock, Nedum Onuoha and Julien Laurens analyse Benfica goalkeeper Anatoliy Trubin's 98th-minute goal which sent his side into the play-offs.

items.title: Galaxy S26 series could support satellite communication
items.summary: The Galaxy S26 series, expected to debut next month, may come with satellite communication support. All three models in the lineup have appeared on the FCC database, revealing details about their connectivity features. According to FCC listings for the US variants of the Galaxy S26, Galaxy S26+, anâ€¦

items.title: Rare night of joy for Salah and Slot amid turbulent season
items.summary: After sweeping their way into the last 16, chief football writer Phil McNulty asks can the Champions League rescue Liverpool's season of turmoil?

items.title: Mark Zuckerberg is all in on AI as the new social media
items.summary: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg's metaverse dreams seem to have been replaced by a new vision: an AI-generated social feed. In an earnings call on Wednesday, Zuckerberg reiterated his belief that AI will become the next big media format, making feeds "more immersive and interactive:" We started with text,â€¦

items.title: England on course for fifth Champions League spot
items.summary: Could the Premier League get an extra place in the Champions League again? This is how it looks at the end of the league phase.

items.title: Windows 11 has reached 1 billion users faster than Windows 10
items.summary: Windows 11 has reached a big milestone | Image: Getty Images Windows 11 now has one billion users. Microsoft hit the milestone during the recent holiday quarter, meaning Windows 11 has managed to reach one billion users faster than Windows 10 did nearly six years ago. "Windows reached a big milestoâ€¦

items.title: Juventus eye Kolo Muani & Zirkzee - Thursday's gossip
items.summary: Spurs' Randal Kolo Muani and Manchester United's Joshua Zirkzee are attracting interest from Juventus, Harry Maguire is waiting for contract talks, Bournemouth want Inter Milan winger Luis Henrique, plus more.

items.title: Keeper scores dramatic late goal against Real to put Benfica into play-offs
items.summary: Benfica goalkeeper Anatoliy Trubin scores in stoppage time to help his side into the play-offs on goal difference after a thrilling win 4-2 win over nine-man Real Madrid.

items.title: Tesla discontinuing Model S and Model X to make room for robots
items.summary: Tesla will discontinue the Model S and Model X in the second quarter of 2026, Elon Musk said in an earnings call with investors today. No advance word was given about the cancellations, making it an abrupt ending for Tesla's two original flagship EVs. Musk said the reasons for cancelling the vehiclâ€¦

items.title: The best iPhones
items.summary: New iPhones for the AI era. | Image: Cath Virginia / The Verge If youâ€™ve been holding off on getting a new iPhone, nowâ€™s the perfect time to size up your options. Appleâ€™s 2025 iPhone lineup is now widely available, which includes the iPhone 17, 17 Pro, 17 Pro Max, and a brand-new model, the ultra-tâ€¦

items.title: Rashford scores as Barcelona beat Copenhagen
items.summary: Marcus Rashford gets on the scoresheet as Barcelona come from behind to soundly defeat Copenhagen 4-1, as they secure automatic qualification into the last 16 of the Champions League.

items.title: Bayern secure league phase spot with victory over PSV
items.summary: Jamal Musiala scores on his first start for Bayern Munich since July as they secure second spot in the league phase of the Champions League with a hard-fought win at PSV Eindhoven.

items.title: Arsenal maintain perfect record with narrow win over Kairat
items.summary: First-half goals from Viktor Gyokeres, Kai Havertz and Gabriel Martinelli give Arsenal a 3-2 win over Kairat to completing a perfect league phase for the Gunners with eight victories in eight games.

items.title: Liverpool march into last 16 with six-goal Qarabag thrashing
items.summary: Liverpool thrash Qarabag 6-0 to automatically reach the last 16 of the Champions League.

items.title: Newcastle face play-off after draw with holders PSG
items.summary: Joe Willock scores for Newcastle as they draw 1-1 with PSG at the Parc des Princes to confirm their place in the Champions League play-offs.

items.title: Watch Benfica keeper score stoppage-time goal against Real Madrid
items.summary: Goalkeeper Anatoliy Trubin scores in the 98th minute to give Benfica a 4-2 win over Real Madrid - a goal which also secured Jose Mourinho's side a place in the last 16 play-offs of the Champions League on goal difference.

items.title: Snap spins off Specs Inc, Spectacles smart glasses will launch later this year
items.summary: As the smart glasses market heats up, Snap Inc. (the company behind Snapchat) is doing some corporate restructuring in preparation for the launch of its Spectacles smart glasses later this year. The company is spinning off Specs Inc. as a wholly-owned subsidiary. It says that this move will provideâ€¦

items.title: Pedro scores superb double to give Chelsea top eight finish
items.summary: Joao Pedro scores twice as Chelsea beat Napoli 3-2 to secure automatic qualification into the last 16 of the UEFA Champions League.

items.title: Man City avoid play-offs with Galatasary win
items.summary: Manchester City beat Galatasaray to confirm a spot in the round of 16 of the UEFA Champions League by narrowly finishing eighth in the league phase.

items.title: Spurs see off Frankfurt to secure last 16 qualification
items.summary: Goals from Randal Kolo Muani and Dominic Solanke give Tottenham a comfortable 2-0 away win against Eintracht Frankfurt, as Thomas Frank's side finish the league phase in fourth to automatically qualify for the last 16 of the Champions League.

items.title: NFL head coach tracker - Browns hire Monken
items.summary: Check the latest on the NFL hiring cycle as teams start to fill their vacant head coach roles after the regular season.

items.title: The best Xbox controller to buy right now
items.summary: We live in a golden age of controllers. The gamepads on the market now are of higher quality, more versatile, and more customizable than anything from even one console generation ago. If you play games on an Xbox Series X or Series S (or a Windows PC), you have the unenviable task of choosing betweâ€¦

items.title: Aki banned for Ireland's first three Six Nations games
items.summary: Bundee Aki is suspended for Ireland's first three Six Nations matches after being handed a four-game ban for "verbal abuse and disrespect" towards match officials in Connacht's URC loss to Leinster.

items.title: Ireland's Aki hit with four-game ban for verbally abusing match officials
items.summary: Bundee Aki is suspended for Ireland's first three Six Nations matches after being handed a four-game ban for "verbal abuse and disrespect" towards match officials in Connacht's URC loss to Leinster.

items.title: Google adds Gemini AI-powered â€˜auto browseâ€™ to Chrome
items.summary: Google is launching a new "auto browse" feature inside Chrome that can perform multi-step tasks on your behalf. The Gemini AI-powered capability is coming to Google AI Pro and Ultra subscribers in the US, and can do things like research hotel and flight costs, schedule appointments, fill out onlineâ€¦

items.title: Tesla says production-ready Optimus robot is coming soon
items.summary: In its earnings report, Tesla says that the third-generation version of its Optimus humanoid robot "meant for mass production" will be unveiled in the first quarter of 2026. This new version of Optimus will include "major upgrades from version 2.5, including our latest hand design." And the companyâ€¦

items.title: Grab one of the best air coolers on the market for $33 â€” Thermalright's Peerless Assassin 120 SE is 15% off on Amazon
items.summary: Thermalright's Peerless Assassin 120 SE is on sale for $33. Get one of the best air coolers on the market right now for even cheaper.

items.title: Microsoft reports strong cloud earnings in Q2 as gaming declines
items.summary: Microsoft just posted the second quarter of its 2026 fiscal financial results. The software maker made $81.3 billion in revenue and a net income of $30.9 billion during Q3. Revenue is up 17 percent, and net income has increased by 23 percent. The holiday quarter saw PC shipments grow unexpectedly aâ€¦
